source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, ct2020, ctlabel as geolabel, boroct2020, nta2020, boroct2020 AS geoid, boroct2020 AS id, 7 as pop, 9 as hh FROM nyct2020

SELECT the_geom_webmercator, ct2010, borocode || ct2010 AS boroct2010, cb2010, borocode, bctcb2010, bctcb2010 AS geoid, bctcb2010 AS id, (ct2010::float / 100)::text || ' - ' || cb2010 as geolabel FROM dcp_census_blocks_2010
